name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cat Sakura Street Pixel Live Wallpaper New Tab

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stroll down a pixel art Sakura street with a charming cat companion in this nostalgic, retro-styled live wallpaper! 🌸🐈🎮

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Step into a world of pixelated cherry blossoms and neon-lit streets with Cat Sakura Street Pixel. This unique live wallpaper brings a retro gaming vibe to your Chrome browser, featuring a cute cat wandering a Japanese street lined with blooming sakura trees. Perfect for fans of pixel art, Japanese aesthetics, and cats, this extension captures the tranquil yet lively spirit of sakura season with every new tab.

Key Features
🖼️ Live Pixel Wallpaper: Enjoy a pixel art street scene filled with cherry blossoms and an adorable cat.
🔗 Customizable Site Shortcuts: Quickly access favorite sites with editable shortcuts for convenience.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Integrated search bar for fast, on-theme browsing.
🕒 Clock & Date Display: Stylish clock and date fit the retro design while keeping you on track.
🔗 Quick Access Links: Easily find “Remove Extension” and “More Extensions” options in the lower left corner.
Transform each new tab into a peaceful walk down a sakura street with your feline friend. Blending charming pixel art and essential tools, this extension is a delight for any pixel art or cat lover.
